item.title: Taylor expansions: An easy derivation
item.description: Introduction Recently I had to bound the error in a Taylor expansion. However I forgot the form of the error term, so I had to look it up. This was not the first time I’ve had to look it up. In fact, though I first learned about Taylor expansions in 201411 Shoutout to Ms. Dartnell! , up till 2021 I struggled to remember the remainder formula. This post is my attempt to re-derive Taylor expansions in a way I can finally remember.
